Text.val: general variables
//I need this variable to define the "alias variable" for the DEBH_NO
//the program searches for
additional search name and address from scan task
Complete statement
// Author : Juergen Paarmann
18.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Removed search logic for debtors in black list; Extended bankaccount search
with seach on IBAN (tables DEBC/DCBA)
25.10.2013 SH SCR17733 Add possible missing escape character to searchwords in task
02.10.2013 SH SCR18177 Omitted message "Please us another search key" (DH0113) if for the search
reserved words are used and debtors are found
01.03.2012 SH SCR17053 Added information barrier for debtor client search in task
"WriteResultForDEBCSearch"; Removed ICA stuff
28.04.2011 SH SCR16428 Replaced GB002 by GB902
//20-12-2005 JP SCR #9765 changed single DHIC_ID search as described in SCR.
//03-11-2005 JP SCR #9386 changed handling for reserved words
//27-10-2005 JP SCR #9195 extend search, see SCR
//29-08-2005 JP SCR #8936 fixed bug in debtor search (see SCR)
//18-08-2005 JP SCR #8750 fixed bug in debtor search (see SCR)
//30-06-2004 AS SCR #8624 fixed hardcoded collection name FLPROD
//18-05-2005 JP SCR #8303 fixed bug in debtor search, see SCR
//12-04-2005 JP SCR #7913 add handling for only debtors from blacklist
//30-09-2004 JP SCR #7093 added hardcoded extract character string
//21-07-2004 JP SCR #6667 add search handling for debtor ID numbers
//24-06-2004 JP SCR #6442 add special extraction
//05-04-2004 JP SCR #5888 block extraction for the first three characters
//01-04-2004 JP SCR #5766 add blocking search with reserved words
//10-02-2004 AS SCR #1402 cancelling debtor client search with ESC seemed not to
work because the Subtask WriteResultForDEBCSearch opened a task window
//15-01-2004 JP SCR #5196 add new search filter
//05-11-2003 JP request JP: change first param in call GB002 from "D" to "H"
//14-07-2003 JP SCR #3595 replace INSTR() value in Country task
//04-07-2003 JP request DD: fixed problem with DHSH and country search
(within where clause there was a cast-statement)
//02-07-2003 JP request JDO: implement range on DEBC_NO when writing result from
DEBC ( if a lot of identical DEBC_DEBH-> search is to long)
//06-06-2003 JP SCR #3690 decrease SearchRate ONLY until=2 in "OnlyActive" task
//24-03-2003 JP SCR #3192 change describtion
//10-03-2003 JP SCR #3089 only allow second search word > 1 letter
//11-12-2002 JP SCR #2516 implement new behavior for extraction with global
string. This string contains the possible separators.
//05-06-2002 JP added search for country code SCR #1406
//19-06-2002 JP change building SQL statement due to problems with the
// address field SCR #1503
... delete memory table to store search results
Actual Separator
Previous separator
eliminate points and hyphens in the address (street) name
BUT : only if there is an additional blnak separator !!!
//fill Extraction character
-- Add possible missing escape character to searchwords
first start -> up to letter number 4
//05-04-2004 JP SCR #5888 block extraction for the first three characters
//24-06-2004 JP SCR #6442 add special extraction
extract second search word and delete all text up from the first word
extract second search word and delete all text up from the first word
extract second search word and delete all text up from the first word
@This event adds escape characters to extracted searchwords in case of single quotes to
prevent SQL errors (basically single quotes are already removed before within searchwords but not
leading single quotes, see R.S. condition --> counter(0)>1 to perform block)

search with DEBH,DEBC

search with ADMNO.CLNTNO,DEBH

ExpSyntax.val: 'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBC WHERE DEBC_DEBC='''&Trim ({1,3})&''' FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBC WHERE DEBC_DEBC='''&Trim ({1,3})&''' and DEBC_DEBH='&Trim (Str ({1,2},'#9'))&' FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT a.DEBH_NO,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBH a WHERE a.DEBH_NO='&Trim (Str ({1,2},'#9'))&' FOR FETCH ONLY'

'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBC WHERE DEBC_ADMNO='&Trim (Str ({1,4},'#4'))&' and DEBC_CLNTNO='&Trim (Str ({1,5},'#5'))&' and DEBC_DEBH='&Trim (Str ({1,2},'#9'))&' FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBC WHERE DEBC_ADMNO='&Trim (Str ({1,4},'#4'))&' and DEBC_CLNTNO='&Trim (Str ({1,5},'#5'))&' FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBC WHERE DEBC_ADMNO='&Trim (Str ({1,4},'#4'))&' and DEBC_CLNTNO='&Trim (Str ({1,5},'#5'))&' and DEBC_DEBC='''&Trim ({1,3})&''' FOR FETCH ONLY'

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,25}='','a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,7})&'%''','a.DHSH_DEBH_NO=aa.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,7})&'%'''&' and aa.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and aa.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,25})&'%''')

Trim ({0,8})&' b.DHSH_DEBH_NO=bb.DHSH_DEBH_NO and b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,8})&'%'' and '&IF ({1,26}<='999','bb.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=3','bb.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2')&' and bb.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,26})&'%'''

IF ({1,27}='',Trim ({0,10})&' c.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=4 and c.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,10})&'%''',Trim ({0,10})&' c.DHSH_DEBH_NO=cc.DHSH_DEBH_NO and c.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=4 and c.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,10})&'%'''&' and cc.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=4 and cc.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,27})&'%''')
'SELECT '&Trim ({1,24})&'.DHSH_DEBH_NO,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({0,6})&' WHERE '&Trim ({0,13})&' FOR FETCH ONLY'
Left ({1,28},InStr ({1,28},'FOR FETCH ONLY')-1)&' union SELECT DEBP_DEBH_NO,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBP WHERE DEBP_TEL like '''&Trim ({1,12})&'%'''&' FOR FETCH ONLY'

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,25}='','a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,7})&'%''','a.DHSH_DEBH_NO=aa.DHSH_DEBH_NO and a.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and a.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,7})&'%'''&' and aa.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=1 and aa.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,25})&'%''')

IF ({1,26}='',Trim ({0,8})&' b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,8})&'%''',Trim ({0,8})&' b.DHSH_DEBH_NO=bb.DHSH_DEBH_NO and b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,8})&'%'''&' and bb.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and bb.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,26})&'%''')

Trim ({0,8})&' b.DHSH_DEBH_NO=bb.DHSH_DEBH_NO and b.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2 and b.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,8})&'%'' and '&IF ({1,26}<='999','bb.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=3','bb.DHSH_FIELDTYPE=2')&' and bb.DHSH_SEARCHSTRING like '''&Trim ({1,26})&'%'''

ExpSyntax.val: ' and (DEBC_BANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,13})&''' or DEBC_BANKIBAN='''&Trim({1,13})&''' or DEBC_NO in (select DCBA_DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DCBA where DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,13})&''' or DCBA_IBAN='''&Trim({1,13})&'''))'
'SELECT DHIC_DEBH,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DHIC WHERE DHIC_ID like '''&Trim ({1,14})&'%'' FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT DHIC_DEBH,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DHIC WHERE DHIC_INFS_CODE='''&Trim ({1,15})&''' FOR FETCH ONLY'
'SELECT DHIC_DEBH,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DHIC WHERE DHIC_INFS_CODE='''&Trim ({1,15})&''' and DHIC_ID like '''&Trim ({1,14})&'%'' FOR FETCH ONLY'

'SELECT DEBC_DEBH,CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(9,0)) FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBC WHERE DEBC_BANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,13})&''' or DEBC_BANKIBAN='''&Trim({1,13})& ''' or DEBC_NO in (select DCBA_DEBC_NO FROM '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DCBA where DCBA_LASTRECVPAYBANKACCOUNT='''&Trim ({1,13})&''' or DCBA_IBAN='''&Trim({1,13})&''') FOR FETCH ONLY'
